item.description: This past Monday we watched part of a video with Eckhart Tolle: the Findhord Retreat. Eckhart's simple message and humble style make for a clear and direct presentation, which we'll continue in this weekly meetup. We'll do several short meditations, one of which may be guided, and have time for discussion and intention setting. Please come join us in spiritual community as we connect with like-minded people seeking awareness, clarity, and present-moment living.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting people at the door until about 6:30pm.
item.name: Weely Meetup: The Power of Now
